title: Continuity and change in family life 1700-1900

content.question: Directions: Answer all parts of the following question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Sources have been edited for the purposes of this exercise.Identify and explain ONE continuity in European family life from 1700 through 1900.Identify and explain ONE change in European family life from 1700 through 1900.Identify and explain a SECOND distinct change in European family life from 1700 through 1900.

topic.text: 6.1: Contextualizing Industrialization and its Origins and Effects
